revisions.rev:
After [[Alexandria]] fell under [[Muslim control]], it gradually lost its importance, since the newly created Empire was not dependant on Land, and with other ports nearby, like [[Damietta]], and Palestinian Ports, but nevertheless the city includes several large and important mosques. after Napoleon came in, the city started to regain its power, over the nearby port of [[Rosetta]]. today the city is the second largest, in Egypt, and one of the main important [[Mediterranean sea]] ports.
==[[Rashidun Caliphate|Rashidunids]]== *[[Attarin mosque, Alexandria|Attarin mosque]]
